name: VideoArchiver
author: Cline
description:
A powerful Discord video archiver cog that automatically downloads and reposts videos from monitored channels. Features include:
- GPU-accelerated video compression (NVIDIA, AMD, Intel)
- Multi-core CPU utilization
- Concurrent multi-video processing
- Intelligent quality preservation
- Support for multiple video sites
- Customizable archive messages
- Automatic cleanup
short: Archive videos from Discord channels with GPU-accelerated compression
